text: Mary Morrison may refer to: *Mary Anna Jackson née Morrison (1831–1915), wife of Stonewall Jackson *Mary Anne Morrison (born 1937), lady-in-waiting to Elizabeth II *Mary Louise Morrison (born 1926), Canadian soprano, see 1926 in Canada *Mary Morison or Morrison (1771–1791), Scottish girl thought to be the "lovely Mary Morison" of Robert Burns' poem
title: Mary Morrison
